name: Bewitched (Graven Visual Novels)
description:
Become an apprentice of one of the most peculiar and charismatic witches! Immerse yourself in a world full of strangeness and unusualness and meet the inhabitants of the house on the Silent Cliff. Meet the dangers and overcome the challenges to become a true potion master!


The main character, a boy named Thomas, visits his aunt and suddenly finds himself in a world of miracles and magic. He eventually becomes an apprentice of the young witch Alice, passes the potions exams and reveals the secrets of the Witch world.

* Colorful and beautiful art style.
* Fabulous and warm atmosphere.
* Original soundtrack and realistic sounds that create the effect of presence, which helps you immerse yourself in this magical world.
* Quest mechanics.
* Interactive locations.
